item.title: Israeli strikes across Gaza kill at least 20, including five children
item.description: Israeli strikes across the Gaza Strip overnight and into Sunday killed at least 20 people, including five children, Palestinian medical officials said.

item.title: College students get emotional about climate change. Some are finding help in class
item.description: A recent survey finds that more than half of young people aged 16-25 are highly worried about climate change. Some universities are now trying to help them navigate those emotions in class.

item.title: Pickup truck driver killed by police after driving through Texas mall and injuring 5
item.description: A pickup truck driver fleeing police careened through the doors of a JCPenney store in Texas and continued through a busy mall, injuring five people before he was fatally shot by officers.

item.title: Two US Navy pilots shot down over Red Sea in apparent 'friendly fire' incident
item.description: Two U.S. Navy pilots were shot down Sunday over the Red Sea by apparent "friendly fire", the most serious incident to threaten troops in over a year of America targeting Yemen's Houthi rebels.
